# cmccloudv2_eip (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
#create a simple EIP
resource "cmccloudv2_eip" "eip_terraform" {    
    billing_mode 		= "monthly" 
    domestic_bandwidth 	= 500 
    inter_bandwidth 	= 10
    description 		= "eip created from terraform" 
}

#create a EIP with advance options
resource "cmccloudv2_eip" "eip_terraform" {    
    billing_mode 		= "monthly" 
    domestic_bandwidth 	= 500 
    inter_bandwidth 	= 10
    description 		= "eip created from terraform"
	tags 	 			= [{"key": "env", "value": "prod"}]
    dns_domain 			= "example.com."
    dns_name 			= "my-ip" 
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `billing_mode` (String) The billing mode of the EIP. A valid value is monthly or hourly.
- `description` (String) A description of the EIP. Changing this updates the EIP's description.
- `dns_domain` (String) The DNS domain of the EIP.
- `dns_name` (String) The DNS name of the EIP.
- `domestic_bandwidth` (Number) Domestic bandwidth in Mbps
- `inter_bandwidth` (Number) International bandwidth in Mbps
- `tags` (Block Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--tags))
- `timeouts` (Block, Optional) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--timeouts))

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation time of the EIP.
- `eip_address` (String) The IP address of the EIP after it is allocated.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `status` (String) The status of the EIP.

<a id="nestedblock--tags"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tags`

Required:

- `key` (String) The key of the tag
- `value` (String) The value of the tag


<a id="nestedblock--timeouts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `timeouts`

Optional:

- `create` (String)
- `delete` (String)
- `update` (String)
